instructions.text: Obtain the following parts:
707-30331A-01: WINDOW, HALO2.0 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ QTY: 1
707-30330A-01: OUTER GASKET, HALO2.0, WINDOW, EPDM Ã¢â‚¬â€œ QTY: 1
707-30327A-01: INNER GASKET, HALO2.0, WINDOW, EPDM Ã¢â‚¬â€œ QTY: 1
707-30074A-01: BK, BEZEL, WINDOW, EXT Ã¢â‚¬â€œ QTY: 1
Fasteners: HN4065: HNHX5MM.SS.NLN Ã¢â‚¬â€œ QTY: 12 (Ed1.2)
Remove the protective film from the inside and outside surface of the window. Keep the protective film to reapply to the outside surface of the window at completion of assembly.
Ensure the middle section of the Vinyl has not been removed as shown in Figure 54.

Assemble the Bezel (707-3074A-01), followed by the Outer Gasket (707-3003A-01), followed by the Window (707-3001A-01), followed by Inner Gasket (707-3302A-01) and then fit the assembly onto the front face of the enclosure. Ensure that the vinyl is on the inside of the enclosure.
instructions.picture_description: A diagram showing the assembly parts (Bezel, Gaskets, Window).

instructions.text: Apply the protective film to the outside surface of the window.
instructions.picture_description: Figure showing the assembly parts of the enclosure.

instructions.text: Obtain the following parts for assembly of Flash/Radar Pivot Mounts:
707-301204-01: BKT, MOUNT, MODULE, UNIV, RT Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Qty: 1
707-301204-02: BKT, MOUNT, MODULE, UNIV, LT Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Qty: 1
707-301201-01: BKT, PIVOT, RADAR/FLASH Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Qty: 1
707-301313-02: PIVOT, RADAR/FLASH Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Qty: 2
Use WAA-061: WAA*M4, L*6, SM/XM10, PCWHT Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Qty: 4
Use WMA-0042: WMA*PH1, M3X8MM ST7 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Qty: 4
Insert the Right and Left Radar/Flash Pivot Brackets onto their respective Right and Left Mount Brackets.
instructions.picture_description: Figure 56 showing the assembly of Right and Left Radar/Flash Pivot Brackets on Mount Brackets.

instructions.text: Place washers on the hex nuts and fasten with hex nuts as shown in Figure 56.
Tighten the hex nuts sufficiently so that the brackets pivot but are not loose.
Fasten the bottom Right and Left Pivot Brackets with x4 M3X8MM screws in the holes shown in Figure 57.
instructions.picture_description: Figure 57 showing the fastening of bottom Right and Left Pivot Brackets.

instructions.text: Obtain the following parts:
707-2002A-02: VLMNT, ENC, HALO2 - Qty 1
707-301202A-01: BKT, MOUNT, MODULE, UNI, LT - Qty 1
707-301202A-02: BKT, MOUNT, MODULE, UNI, RT - Qty 2
707-30145A-02: PLT, INDICATOR ANGLE FLASH/RADAR, RT - Qty 2
707-30141A-01: BKT, RISER, SWITCH, PROX - Qty 1
Fasteners:
HN-0020: HN.5X5MM.ST.ZN.LN - Qty: 20 (Edit. 2)
HN-0065: HN.M5X5MM.SS.N - Qty: 2
Fasten the Right Mount Bracket (707-30120A-01) into the Enclosure Body studs (707-2002A-02) and secure it with 26 M5 hex nuts (HN-0020) as shown in Figure 58.
instructions.picture_description: A diagram of the enclosure body with brackets and components.

instructions.text: Repeat with the Left Mount Bracket (707-30120A-02).
Insert the Right Angle Indicators (707-3014542) onto the Enclosure Body studs (707-20002A-01) and fasten with M5 hex nuts (HN-0020) as shown in Figure 59.
instructions.picture_description: Illustration of the Right Angle Indicators installed on the Enclosure Body.

instructions.text: Repeat with the Left Angle Indicators (707-301454-01).
Insert the Switch Riser Bracket into the following stud positions and fasten with x2 M4 hex nuts (HN-0065) as shown in Figure 60.
instructions.picture_description: Illustration of the Switch Riser Bracket installation.

instructions.text: Obtain the following parts:
3. BEARING, LINEAR, DRIVING, ST., ZN - Qty: 4
4. BKT, RISER, CAMERA, MODULE, LT - Qty: 1
Fasteners:
1. HN-0065: HN.HAXM5M.SS.NL.N - Qty: 12
2. MS-0107: MS.PH.PK.M16X21MZ.ST.ZN.EX.KP - Qty: 8
Slide the O-Ring (707-602464-01) onto the Eyebolt Mount (707-301354-10). Then insert the Eyebolt Mount into the top of the Enclosure Body and fasten with M4 hex nuts (HN-0065) as shown in Figure 61.
instructions.picture_description: A diagram showing the camera riser assembly with parts labeled.

instructions.text: Fasten the M10X12MM screw (HB-0019) onto the top of the Eyebolt Mount as shown in Figure 61.
instructions.picture_description: A diagram showing the camera riser assembly with parts labeled.

instructions.text: Screw x4 Bearing Blocks (707-60162A-01) onto the Left and Right Camera Module Riser Brackets (707-30075A-01, 707-30075A-02) using x6 M6X12MM (MSM-10T) screws as shown in Figure 62.
instructions.picture_description: A diagram showing the placement of bearing blocks on riser brackets.

instructions.text: Then fasten the Left and Right Camera Module Riser Brackets (707-30075A-01, 707-30075A-02) onto the top of the Enclosure Body (707-20002A-01) and fasten with x8 M4 hex nuts (HN-0055) as shown in Figure 63.
instructions.picture_description: A diagram illustrating the assembly of the riser brackets onto the enclosure body.

instructions.text: Obtain the following parts:
5158-900-01: HALO-2.1 Cable Assembly, Power IEC 320-C13, 300mm - US - Qty: 1
700-601714-01: SPACER, ALUM, 8MMX19.2MMX2.6MM - Qty: 2
707-300604-01: BKT, MNT, TOP, SUNSHIELD - Qty: 1
707-300608-01: BKT, SUNSHIELD, LT - Qty: 1
707-301674-01: BKT, RISER, TERM BULK - Qty: 1
707-301946-01: BKT, SUNSHIELD, 1 QUICK LIFT - Qty: 1
707-303329-01: BKT, COVER, FIELD WIRING - Qty: 1
707-301949-01: HINGE, LFT OFF, RINE, CHROME ML - Qty: 1
700-406560-01: LABEL, WARNING, ELECTRIC SHOCK HAZARD, 1K2, VINYL - Qty: 1
Obtain the following fasteners:
MS-0019: PH.PH1.7MXXHAMX8/MMX3/2N - Qty: 1 (Ed. 2)
AH-42: BH. 1/4 INCH, FLAT, AL ST - Qty: 2 - (Ed. 1)
HN-28: HINGE, 7 IN, 2 - Qty: 1
HN-30: HINGE S/S, MNX 25X25 - Qty: 1
HN-45: HN. H6MMXSMS.SN.LNY - Qty: 2 (Ed. 2)
Screw the terminal block (700-703640-01) onto the Terminal Block Riser Bracket using an M3X18MM (MS-0018) screws as shown in Figure 64.
instructions.picture_description: Figure 64 shows the terminal block mounted on the Terminal Block Riser Bracket.

instructions.text: Place the Terminal Block Riser Bracket onto the studs of the Enclosure Body (707-20002A-01) as shown in Figure 65. Fasten with x3 M3 (NH-0044) hex nuts.
instructions.picture_description: A diagram showing the placement of a Terminal Block Riser Bracket on an enclosure.

instructions.text: Connect the black and white cables of 1518-9001-08 to bottom ceramic terminal block as shown in Figure 66 (black cable at bottom, white cable at top).
instructions.picture_description: An image depicting the connection of black and white cables to a terminal block.

instructions.text: Place #1 NH-0038 hex nut onto the earth stud as shown in Figure 66.
instructions.picture_description: An image illustrating the positioning of a hex nut on the earth stud.

instructions.text: If a permanent earth marking or engraving is not applied to the metalwork, apply an Earth sticker label in the following location as shown in Figure 66.
instructions.picture_description: An image showing where to apply an Earth sticker label on the metalwork.

instructions.text: Clip the x1 700-60662A-01 bushing in the location shown in Figure 67. Secure 5158-9001-08 to the left bushing.
instructions.picture_description: Figure 67 shows the bushing clip location.

instructions.text: Pack the remaining x1 700-60662A-01 bushing into a separate bag. Ensure they are wrapped and shipped with the enclosure.
Perform 2 rivets (AK-42-28) to reinforce the Field Wiring Cover Bracket (707-30339A-01) as shown in Figure 68.
instructions.picture_description: Figure 68 shows the Field Wiring Cover Bracket.

instructions.text: Place the 700-40665A-01 warning label on the cover of the bracket.
Place the Field Wiring Cover Bracket (707-30339A-01) onto the Enclosure Body and fasten with x2 HN-0202 hex nuts as shown in Figure 69 (right-hand side).
Place x4 P-Clips (700-7697A.01) onto the Enclosure Body and fasten with x4 M4 (HN-0065) hex nuts as shown in Figure 70.
instructions.picture_description: Figure 70 shows the placement of P-Clips on the Enclosure Body.

instructions.text: Clip 515B-9001-08 to the left most P-Clips shown in Figure 70.
instructions.picture_description: Figure 70 shows where to attach Clip 515B-9001-08.

instructions.text: Place the x2 hinges (706-270A.01) onto the Enclosure Body (707-2002A.01) and fasten with x4 8-32x3/8 flat Phillips Head screws as shown in Figure 71.
instructions.picture_description: Figure 71 shows the placement of the hinges on the Enclosure Body.

instructions.text: Refer to Figure 71 for the assembly layout.
instructions.picture_description: A diagram showing the inside of an enclosure with labeled components.

instructions.text: Ensure all parts are available as listed in the parts list.
Prepare the assembly area with the necessary tools such as a screwdriver and pliers.
Begin by aligning the main components as shown in the diagram.
instructions.picture_description: The diagram depicts how to position components within the enclosure.

instructions.text: Secure the components using the provided screws and bolts.
Double-check the assembly against Figure 71 to ensure accuracy.
instructions.picture_description: Final assembly check with component layout.

instructions.text: Obtain the following parts: 707-100664-01 S/A DOOR, SERVICE PNL - QTY: 1
Position the door at a 90Ã‚Â° angle to the enclosure and align the hinges.
When the hinges are aligned, lower the door so that the hinges engage.
Obtain the following parts:
707-300640-01: BKT, MNT, TOP, SUNSHIELD - Qty: 2
707-300864-01: BKT, SUNSHIELD, LT - Qty: 1
707-300865-01: BKT, SUNSHIELD, RT - Qty: 1
707-301494-01: BKT, SPACER, SUNSHIELD, QUICK LIFT - Qty: 4
Obtain the following fasteners:
HB-0020: HB.HS1X14MM.SS - Qty: 2
MS-0132: MS.PHT.F.3X3/8.SS - Qty: 12
HN-0020: HN.MSXSMSM.ST.ZN.LN - Qty: 8
Insert the Aluminium Spacers (700-6017A-01) onto the studs located on the top side of the Enclosure Body as shown in Figure 73 (left-hand side).
instructions.picture_description: Figure 73 shows the left-hand side of the enclosure with aluminium spacers.

instructions.text: Add QTY: 8 - M5 Hex nuts (HN-0020) to the studs on each side of the Enclosure Body as shown in Figure 73 (right-hand side) with 4 each side. Leave a gap of 3mm between the flange of the nut and the enclosure side.
instructions.picture_description: Figure 73 shows the right-hand side of the enclosure with hex nuts positioned.

instructions.text: Add QTY: 2 - Bracket 707-30119A-01 to the left-hand Sunshield and fasten using QTY: 6 - fasteners MS-1012 as shown in Figure 74.
instructions.picture_description: Figure 74 illustrates the left-hand sunshield with brackets and fasteners.

instructions.text: Repeat for the right-hand Sunshield.
instructions.picture_description: Figure 74 also represents the action for the right-hand sunshield similarly.

instructions.text: Place the Left and Right Sunshields (707-300864A-01, 707-300864A-02) onto the Enclosure Body.
instructions.picture_description: A diagram showing the placement of Left and Right Sunshields on the Enclosure Body.

instructions.text: If the brackets are difficult to locate onto the hex nuts, loosen them slightly until the sun shields fit securely.
Insert the 2 Sunshield Mounts (707-300864A-01) into the slots and fasten with 2 MSX14MM hex screws (HB-0202) as shown in Figure 75.
instructions.picture_description: A diagram showing the insertion of Sunshield Mounts and fastening with hex screws.

instructions.text: Obtain the following parts:
Place the PATCH PANEL PCB (5158-0007-00) onto the stand-offs and fit 4 x MS-0098 fasteners (circled yellow).
instructions.picture_description: A detailed image of the PATCH PANEL PCB with highlighted fasteners.

instructions.text: Attach the Patch Panel Bracket to the right side of the enclosure using 3 x HN-0020 fasteners (circled as shown in figure below).
Attach the RJ45-RJ45 coupler jack (700-7269A-01) to the Patch Panel Bracket (highlighted in green in the orientation shown below).
Obtain the following parts:
- 515B-1020-00: HALO2 - CABLE ASSEMBLY, PATCH PANEL TO DCDC Ã¢â‚¬â€œ QTY: 1
- Fasteners: HN-0044: HMMX34MM.SS.NLN Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Qty: 4
Attach the DC-DC converter to the right side of the enclosure using a 4 x M3 (HN-0044) hex nut fasteners (circled yellow) as shown in figure below.
instructions.picture_description: Two images showing correct and incorrect methods of connecting the DC-DC converter.

instructions.text: Connect 515B-1020-00 to the DCDC converter and patch panel (shown in above picture).
IMPORTANT: The cable colours shown in image are not correct. Refer below for correct cable colour connections.
- Red: +Vin
- Green: -Vin (GND_IN)
- Yellow: +Vout
Identify the Black -Vout (GND.OUT) connection.
instructions.picture_description: Figure 77 shows the Black -Vout connection.

instructions.text: Check the connection point as indicated in Figure 78.
instructions.picture_description: Figure 78 shows another view of the connection point.

instructions.text: Inspect the overall wiring as shown in Figure 79.
instructions.picture_description: Figure 79 provides a comprehensive view of the wiring setup.

instructions.text: Obtain the following parts: 707-303344-01 (Plate, Seal, Antennae, Outer/Inner - QTY: 1), 707-303346-01 (Plate, Seal, Antennae, Mid - QTY: 1), 707-603346-01 (Gasket, Seal, Antennae, Flp - QTY: 1), 707-303344-02 (Gasket, Seal, Antennae, Inner - QTY: 1), Fasteners: HH-0020: HMNX5X5MM, ST, ZN,NLN - QTY: 3 (Ed. 2).
instructions.picture_description: A circular sealing component displayed with an adhesive surface.

instructions.text: Stick the adhesive side of the Gasket (707-603346-A-01) onto the Outer Plate (707-303344-A-01) as shown in Figure 80.
instructions.picture_description: The gasket being adhered to the outer plate.

instructions.text: Fit the Seal Plate (707-303344-01) onto the Outer Plate studs. Then place the Inner Plate (707-303344-02) on the underside and fasten with x3 M5 hex nuts (HH-0020).
Ensure all components are present before beginning assembly.
instructions.picture_description: An illustration of the enclosure with labeled components.

instructions.text: Position the enclosure on a stable surface to prevent tipping during assembly.
Insert the necessary screws into the designated holes as per the diagram.
instructions.picture_description: An illustration showing the placement of screws.

instructions.text: Tighten screws to secure the components in place, ensuring everything is aligned properly.
Complete the assembly by attaching the top cover securely onto the enclosure.
instructions.picture_description: An illustration of the enclosure with the top cover being placed.

instructions.text: Take the Camera Module that was assembled earlier in the work instruction.
instructions.picture_description: An assembly of components indicating where to place the Camera Module.

instructions.text: Align the rails on the Camera Module with the Bearings on the ceiling of the enclosure and slide the module into position.
instructions.picture_description: Illustration showing the alignment process of the Camera Module.

instructions.text: Tighten the captive screws indicated in white arrows to lock the module in position.
instructions.picture_description: Close-up view of captive screws that need to be tightened.

instructions.text: Connect 5158-1001-00 to the Patch Panel J/S port as shown in the figure.
instructions.picture_description: Detailed view of the Patch Panel J/S port connection.

instructions.text: Obtain the following parts: 707-300674-01: BKT, TIEDOWN, CABLE ENTRY - QTY - 1; 707-306634-01: GSKT, PEDISTAL, CABLE ENTRY, BTM - QTY - 1; 707-306634-02: GSKT, PEDISTAL, CABLE ENTRY, TOP - QTY - 1; Fasteners: HN-0034: HN8.32X15/64,5S80, NL - QTY - 4.
Remove the backing from bottom gasket 707-300644-01 and stick it centered over the hole in the base of the enclosure.
instructions.picture_description: An illustration showing the placement of the gasket over the hole in the enclosure.

instructions.text: Remove the backing from top gasket 707-306634-02 and stick centered on the Cable Entry Plate.
instructions.picture_description: An illustration showing the top gasket being placed on the Cable Entry Plate.

instructions.text: Attach the Plate (gasket assembly) on the 4 studs in the centre of the enclosure base and secure with fasteners x4 HN-0034 hex nuts as shown in Figure 86.
Locate the enclosure as shown in Figure 86.
instructions.picture_description: A diagram of the enclosure and its components, including a circular base and mounting parts.

instructions.text: Identify the mounting points inside the enclosure.
Secure the circular component using the provided screws.
Ensure all connections are tight to avoid any movement.
Finalize the assembly by checking for any missing components.
Obtain the following parts:
S/A JUNCTION BOX, P/S, A/C/D/C - QTY-1
Take the Junction Box Module that was assembled earlier in the work instruction.
Place it at the back of the enclosure aligning it with the studs indicated in yellow.
instructions.picture_description: The image shows the junction box being aligned with studs in an enclosure.

instructions.text: Fasten with 3 M5 hex nuts (HN-0020).
Refer to the torque settings for metric fasteners as listed in the table.
Identify the thread size (e.g., M3, M4, M5, M6, M8) of the fasteners you are using.
Choose the correct torque value according to the material type (zinc plated steel or stainless steel 304) and the type of fastener (socket head, etc.) from the table.
Apply the specified torque setting while fastening.
